document_data.caption: A map showing Darselune Street and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Darselune Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Darselune Street''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Darselune Street was located in the south section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. Darselune Street branched southwest off of a major intersection that included [[Feather Street]], [[Zarimtar Street]], [[the Sutherlane]], and [[Haltovar Street]]. It continued southwest to eventually end on [[Julthoon Street]] at the border with the [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. Other roads intersecting Darselune Street included [[Gulzindar Street]], [[Dob's Loss]], and the [[Street of the Singing Dolphin]].
